name: R-World
description:
Fantasy can provide many rich experiences for people, and in a healthy moderation can benefits people's lives. These things can include a break from life struggles, joy, wonder, and bringing people together through their shared experiences with fantasy. The hope is to break the bad stigma behind using fantasy as a means to escape. This project is an interactive world of my creation where things happen that you can never experience in real life.

Background music for Forest by Selulance
